event_text: During the Gathering, m_c makes an off-color comment about o_c_n's leader, much to o_c_n's shock.
During the Gathering, m_c keeps talking over o_c_n's leader.
While getting to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} spot before beginning the Gathering, m_c steps on the tail of o_c_n's leader. m_c gives no apology for the perhaps-not-quite mistake.
When the o_c_n leader steps up to sit beside m_c at the Gathering, m_c turns {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} head away pointedly.
m_c grins as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/spout/spouts} insults at o_c_n's leader during the Gathering.

m_c is intentional with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} comments during the Gathering. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/manage/manages} to make it clear to o_c_n that c_n is no longer their ally - without being outright insulting.
During the Gathering, m_c is constantly singing o_c_n's praises. The other leaders don't seem so impressed, but o_c_n's leader is quite pleased.
m_c compliments o_c_n's newest warriors at the Gathering.

Another leader during the Gathering makes scathing comments towards o_c_n. m_c skillfully redirects their words into praise for o_c_n; o_c_n's leader sends an appreciative, though appraising, glance to m_c.
Another leader during the Gathering makes scathing comments towards o_c_n. m_c skillfully redirects their words into praise for o_c_n; o_c_n's leader seems appreciative.

m_c speaks to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clanmates before the Gathering, making it clear what tonight's goal is. When c_n arrives at the Gathering Place, they all disperse to find o_c_n cats and take advantage of their prideful nature.
m_c makes a point to praise o_c_n's strong and mighty warriors during the Gathering.
During the Gathering, m_c has a lot to say about o_c_n's recent patrols near c_n borders, and none of it is good.
During the Gathering, m_c spits accusations at o_c_n's leader.
During the Gathering, m_c does {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} best to get on o_c_n's good side.
m_c sidles up to the o_c_n leader during the Gathering and navigates the ensuing conversation with ease. The two seem to be good friends by the end of it.
m_c sidles up to the o_c_n leader during the Gathering and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} charming nature makes friendship a simple matter.
During the Gathering, m_c catches the eye of the o_c_n leader. The two regard each other carefully and, later on, the other leader makes an offer of friendship.
o_c_n's leader is loud and threatening at the Gathering. m_c holds {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ground and shows no fear, earning a look of respect from the other leader.
During the Gathering, m_c has nothing but sharp comments and sarcastic quips to add whenever o_c_n's leader speaks.
m_c spends the Gathering making thinly veiled comments about o_c_n's hunting abilities. By the end of it, the proud o_c_n leader is visibly annoyed.
During the Gathering, m_c does {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} best to make peace with o_c_n's leader.
m_c spends the Gathering attempting small talk with o_c_n's leader and doing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} best to smooth over the harsh edges of their Clans' relationship.
o_c_n's leader looks at m_c with a soft sympathy, agreeing graciously to the stuttered offers of friendship.
o_c_n's leader seems impressed when the apprentice approaches them with confident overtures of friendship.
o_c_n's leader stands beside m_c during the Gathering, offering silent support to the apprentice and, later, accepting m_c's thanks.

o_c_n's leader stares down at m_c and regards {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} stuttered words skeptically, eventually turning away. Their dismissal seems harsh, but their actions throughout the rest of the Gathering have a distinct softness towards the struggling c_n.
o_c_n's leader seems startled at the appearance of m_c leading a Clan. They may not say any words directly to the apprentice, but they don't aim any unnecessary jabs at them either.

o_c_n's leader regards m_c's appearance at the head of c_n impassively. Later on in the Gathering, however, the leader announces their intent to end hostilities with c_n, citing that o_c_n isn't so cruel as to continue attacking an obviously beaten Clan.

The leader of o_c_n laughs at the sight of c_n being led by m_c. The cat makes a comment on how piteous m_c's clan must be, to have an apprentice leading them, and eventually announces that it would be dishonorable for them to continue attacking such dregs.

When c_n arrives at the Gathering and m_c takes {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} place with the Clan leaders, o_c_n's leader watches with gleaming eyes. They later announce their *sincere* sympathies for c_n's struggles and offer a paw of friendship. m_c can't help but feel that {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} acceptance has come with some hidden cost.

When m_c joins the Clan leaders at the Gathering {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} off-put by the distinct looks of disapproval being aimed at o_c_n's leader. Later on, the leader stutters out their intent to lower hostilities with c_n.

m_c is quick to assert {PRONOUN/m_c/self} at the Gathering, announcing that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} received an omen: omen_list_smell_emotional. After a long debate, it's decided that the omen insists o_c_n and c_n cease hostilities.

m_c is quick to assert {PRONOUN/m_c/self} at the Gathering, announcing that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} received an omen: omen_list_smell_emotional. After a long debate, it's decided that the omen insists o_c_n and c_n cease hostilities.

m_c announces at the Gathering that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} received a vision of prophecy_list_sight_sound. The leaders bustle to decide the meaning and, later on, o_c_n's leader insists that a prophecy leaves no room for inter-Clan hostilities.

m_c pulls the o_c_n leader aside during the Gathering. The leader seems shaken when they later return to the Gathering proper - nearby cats whisper that they heard m_c say something about the other leader's dreams. Overtures of peace are hastily accepted when m_c offers them.

m_c dreams the night before the Gathering and hears the whispers of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ancestors. When {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} speak at the Gathering o_c_n's leader shows open disdain, only for clouds to begin covering the moon. The Gathering ends quickly as the enemy leader stutters a worried apology

m_c dreams the night before the Gathering and hears the whispers of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ancestors. When {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} speak at the Gathering o_c_n's leader shows open disdain, only for clouds to begin covering the moon. The Gathering ends quickly as the enemy leader blusters and the other Clans rally behind c_n.
